contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 14th day of October, 2015, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the case is REMANDED to the Superior Court for further consideration in light of Commonwealth v. Carrasquillo, 631 Pa. 692, 115 A.3d 1284 (2015). Jurisdiction relinquished.
